title: Dinnerbone：1.6可能将加入彩色木头
author: seraph0012
txt_content:
本帖最后由 seraph0012 于 2013-4-25 03:00 编辑 

Nathan Adams ‏@Dinnerbone
稍微暂停一下启动器开发，随便试了试有什么有趣的东西可以加入。大家觉得这个彩色木头是否会有用呢？（Taking a small break from launcherstuffs to doodle around with funstuffs. Would this be of use to anybody? ）





Minecraft_13w16b_2013-04-24_19-54-57.png (119.5 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2013-4-25 02:50 上传






Nathan Adams ‏@Dinnerbone
我只是随便问问，不确定是否能真的加入彩色木头，因为它还会需要加入彩色木头台阶之类的一系列物品。但是调查一下大家对这列物品的看法也是很有趣的（ I'm just doodling around, I'm not sure that I can actually add it because it'd want stairs/etc too, but it's fun to investigate these things）

replies.txt_content: MC变得多彩了呐，撒~

replies.txt_content:

好吧，不加彩色木头，一些完全不一样的东西怎样？

Nathan Adams ‏@Dinnerbone
Okay okay, no coloured wood. How about something completely different?
